product_name: REI USB Multination Travel Adapter Plug
long_description: The REI USB Multination Travel Adapter Plug eliminates the need to carry multiple adapter plugs. Its design features a universal receptacle that accepts nearly any appliance's plug configuration.
short_description: The REI USB Multination Travel Adapter Plug eliminates the need to carry multiple adapter plugs. Its design features a universal receptacle that accepts nearly any appliance's plug configuration.
